div.p: The code on a non-institutional claim indicating to whom payment was made or if the claim was denied. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/carrclmpmtdnlcd
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/carr-clm-pmt-dnl-cd defines the following codes:

tr.td: MSP cost avoided - COB Contractor (converted to '00' 2-byte code)
